forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 61F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 64F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
